Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I probably learn more form GenAI, because it gives more detailed feedback and you have more time to ask it questions.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from AI feels less personal and more objective.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: If I had more time to talk to my teachers and they gave more detailed feedback I think it would be better than GenAI.
